channel.title: Diego Rayo | Software Developer
channel.description: Hi, I'm Diego, a Software Developer. I have over 5 years of experience developing Web Solutions. I usually work using JavaScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and GraphQL.

item.title: Thoughts about my profession
item.description: I want to recopile some thoughts about my job and this industry.
item.content:encoded: I want to recopile some thoughts about my job and this industry.
item.author: diegofrayo@gmail.com (Diego Rayo)

item.title: My favorite music and MDX
item.description: MDX is an extension of Markdown language and I want to explain how I use it to create posts on my website's blog. Thanks to MDX I could insert an HTML widget to show the most listened songs in 2022 according to Spotify.
item.content:encoded: MDX is an extension of Markdown language and I want to explain how I use it to create posts on my website's blog. Thanks to MDX I could insert an HTML widget to show the most listened songs in 2022 according to Spotify.
item.author: diegofrayo@gmail.com (Diego Rayo)

item.title: My first post
item.description: This is my first post, here I want to welcome you to my website and explain why I built it.
item.content:encoded: This is my first post, here I want to welcome you to my website and explain why I built it.
